overview:
Mark leads eBureau’s business development and strategic relationship activities.

Mark has held several senior executive positions during his career, helping found and develop successful risk management businesses. After a three year consulting role, Mark spent ten years with Mid-Continent Agencies and held Vice President roles in operations, product development, sales and marketing for this credit and accounts receivable management services company.

Mark joined RiskWise in 1996, co-founded PeopleWise and helped all of the RiskWise organizations with strategy, business development, strategic alliances, product, sales and marketing. He held senior sales and product roles with RiskWise and LexisNexis from 2000 through May of 2004. During this time, Mark also provided strategic advice and guidance related to mergers and acquisitions. Mark is a frequent speaker and presenter to industry organizations and leaders in the areas of identity verification and fraud management.

Mark joined eBureau in the fall of 2004, and leads its business development and strategic relationship activities. He graduated from the University of Notre Dame in 1983.
